What We Offer

Life Fierce Fitness

Shot on location in Poipu and the Kauai Athletic Club.

Experience the Redlands Classic Criterium in 360 VR

Featuring cyclists from the Wildlife Generation Pro Cycling team, as they constantly battle for an ideal position in the peloton lap after lap.

TMC #3: Hutchinson

Featuring a "Jolene" cover, as performed by Hutchinson (Arthur Walton, Talia Arnold, Joe Watson, Paul Cline).

TMC #1: The Musical Conversation ft Albert Bermunez

The Musical Conversation – Episode 1, featuring Albert Bermunez. Produced and edited by U.K.E's own Paul Cline. Mixed by Brent Boberg. DP Mihai Peteu.

Mission

We create studio-quality media assets for emerging artists and businesses.

If you're a musician trying to attract passionate fans, or a business launching a new product, you've come to the right place.

StarterKit Media has access to professional video and audio recording facilities on the island of Kauai and in Los Angeles. Mobile recording is available upon request.

Services

We provide custom-designed packages tailored to your needs – whether it's a four song demo pack & artist press kit or a fully produced and scored promotional video. Check out the Unknown Endeavors YouTube channel for samples of our work.

Our experienced professionals provide an a-la-carte model of services:

Audio Engineering

Certified Pro Tools engineers with 10+ years of experience

Music Videos

Avid and Final Cut Pro-certified

Expert Musicians

Work with in-house studio musicians and songwriting consultants

Studio Time

Record a demo of your original music in a fully-equipped professional studio.

Custom Needs

Combine specific services to meet your needs.

We would love to chat about your project!
Give us the details and we'll contact you with an estimate.

Our Story

Professionally-crafted media for artists and small business at a reasonable price.

  • 2014

    Unknown Endeavors

    Paul Cline, aka Brother Peace Cee, founds UnKnown Endeavors, a multi-pronged production company and entertainment collective that incorporates classic musical ideals and an innovative approach to music and visual media.

  • 2016

    StarterKit Media is Born

    After making the move from Kauai to the City of Lights, we continued to collaborate with LA-based musicians. We noticed that most aspiring or established artists needed a similar set of services.

    This is where the idea of Starter Kit Media was born.

  • 2018

    New Website Launched

    Our new website showcases the services we provide to aspiring and established musicians, artists, as well small businesses.

How can we help?

We offer à la carte solutions tailored to your needs. Tell us more about your project.
